markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 20"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Extradimensional Stash](/Feats.aspx?ID=2748) <actions string="" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Fists of the Ruby Phoenix</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Extradimensional" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=67" />
<trait label="Rogue" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=139" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #168: King of the Mountain](/Sources.aspx?ID=87) pg. 75</row>

**Prerequisites**
Legendary in [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17)

</column>

---

When you perform sleight of hand, you fold space so that objects really do disappear. You create a small extradimensional space somewhere within in your clothing that can hold up to 5 Bulk worth of objects. The space functions as a [_bag of holding_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=249), but can hold only up to 5 Bulk, has no Bulk of its own, and can be Interacted with using only one hand.

 In addition, when you [Palm an Object](/Actions.aspx?ID=67), you can place it directly into this extradimensional space as long as the space has sufficient free space to hold the object.

<title level="2">Capstone Feats</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #168: King of the Mountain](/Sources.aspx?ID=87) pg. 75</row>

Player characters can select one of the following new class feats for their 20th-level class feat upon entering the _Glass Lighthouse_ or by meditating on the cushion in area H4.

**Related Feats**: [All the Time in the World](/Feats.aspx?ID=2744), [Dance of Intercession](/Feats.aspx?ID=2745), [Demon's Hair](/Feats.aspx?ID=2746), [Everdistant Defense](/Feats.aspx?ID=2747), [Head of the Night Parade](/Feats.aspx?ID=2749), [Heart of the Kaiju](/Feats.aspx?ID=2750), [Plum Deluge](/Feats.aspx?ID=2751), [Ruby Resurrection](/Feats.aspx?ID=2752), [Scapegoat Parallel Self](/Feats.aspx?ID=2753), [Sever Space](/Feats.aspx?ID=2754), [Time Dilation Cascade](/Feats.aspx?ID=2755), [Vitality-Manipulating Stance](/Feats.aspx?ID=2756), [Vivacious Afterimage](/Feats.aspx?ID=2757), [Whirlwind Toss](/Feats.aspx?ID=2758), [Worldsphere Gravity](/Feats.aspx?ID=2759)
name: Extradimensional Stash
